nodes.text: The Christophsis blockade was a task force of the Confederate Navy during the Clone Wars.
The force consisted of a number of Lucrehulk-class Droid Control Ships, Munificent-class star frigates and a Separatist dreadnaught.

The force participated in the Battle of Christophsis, maintaining the blockade of the planet. Admiral Trench commanded the fleet. It was eventually broken at several points in the battle, with the loss of Trench's flagship leading to Bail Organa's troops getting much-needed aid. Later on, a task force commanded by Jedi High General Yoda broke the blockade to deliever more troops to hold the planet.
